casebody.data:
SHALLOTTE PARTNERS, LLC
v.
BERKADIA COMMERCIAL MORTGAGE, LLC and Samet Corporation No. 14P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Fenton T. Erwin, Jr., Lex M. Erwin, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, For Shallotte Partners, LLC D. Kyle Deak, Raleigh, Sarah C. Boshears, Durham, Attorneys at Law, For Berkadia Commercial Mortgage, LLC J. Michael Thomas, Donald G. Sparrow, Peyton D. Mansure, Greensboro, Attorneys at Law, For Samet Corporation

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of January 2019 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
